name: Radiator Hospital
description: '''Radiator Hospital''' is an American [[indie rock]] band. Though songwriter Sam Cook-Parrott (vocals/guitar) is from [[Grand Rapids, Michigan]], they are now based in [[Philadelphia]]. The rest of the current lineup is Cynthia Schemmer (guitar/vocals), Jon Rybicki (bass), and [[Swearin'|Jeff Bolt]] (drums). They have released six albums; two out of print [[lo-fi music|lo-fi]] [[compact cassette|cassettes]], and four [[LP records|LP]]s put out by [[Salinas Records]].
